name: Hexseeker
description: Combine hexagons in the quest for the ultimate goal - to find the "F". Discover tons of hype unlockables while you play, and utilize the autoplay feature to grind through levels automatically. Mouse, keyboard, and game controller input are all supported! Compete on numerous Steam leaderboards and enjoy over 20 achievements in this innovative "increaser" style puzzle game. You'll be absolutely puzzled and delighted in your quest to GET THAT F!
